title: Private network fails trying to upgrade protocol

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

body:
### Description
As a private Besu network user, i want to upgrade the protocol to London, but when the network reaches the milestone block number it fails. 

### Steps to Reproduce 
1. Hyperledger Besu private network running
(For each node)
2. Stop a node
3. Add "londonBlock": <Number_of_block> to the genesis.json.
4. Restart the node before reaching milestone block.
5. Wait for the specific block number. 

**Expected behavior:** Upgrade protocol to London and continue producing blocks.

**Actual behavior:** It fails when reaches the milestone block number, 10754000 , and stops producing blocks.
